name: Algodoo Phun Phunlet
summary: Learn about .PHN files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Examples of objects that may be contained in a Phun file include: circles, boxes, polygons, planes, springs, fixates, hinges, pens, and groups. Each object includes its own list of properties, such as position, size, color, etc.

description: Animation scene, or "phunlet," created with Phun, a 2D physics creation program; saved in a text format that contains objects and object properties.
